Plot:
                                                                                                        
No-nonsense L.A.P.D. detective Mitch Preston (Robert De Niro) is a man of few words, little patience and even less style. When a job goes horribly wrong, Mitch receives the usual punishment.....forced participation in a reality-TV show about cops.                                                            
When the show's producer, Chase Rensi (Rene Russo - The Thomas Crown Affair) swoops in and sells the Chief of Police on the PR benefits involved if Mitch plays ball, there really is no way out.                      
                                                                                                            
Even worse, his TV partner is Trey Sellers (Eddie Murphy), a fast-talking rookie police officer who instead of being a cop, would much rather play at being one on TV. Together, they are poised to become stars of the biggest hit reality show in television history. For Mitch it's a living hell. For Trey, it's a dream come true.                                                                                          
                                                                                                            
It's Showtime!                                                                                              
De Niro and Murphy team up for thrills, spills and a lot of laughs in this spoof cop caper with a twist.
